Text:
Sounds like Amy Lee without the hard rockin' boys
Not sure what it is, but it does not sound as Evanescence - OK Music though - I'm listening to the 4th song now - Too much electronica involved
Maybe ita demo of upcoming album - Bitrate is between 160 and 192 - 2 song are 320

In The Shadows is an unofficial CD of the gothic rock band Evanescence made in 2007. The CD contains demos of 1997, 1998, 2001 and 2002, ancient, ep´s outtakes, bonus tracks, acoustics versions and little-known songs from the band .

OK bubandjam - thanx for info

 that explains the Demo sound of this "album"
This is a disaster, it´s some kind of Techno ? I used to LOVE evanescence ,but if this is their new style i can promise that i´ll not give them rankin´1 anymore
but  , i must say that october was more like them , and it was really beautiful =) 0,
